On this blog, you can expect to find posts on the following topics:

  • formal systems
    • logic
    • type theory
    • mathematics, especially subjects with algebraic flavor
  • computing
    • functional programming
    • declarative infrastructure/builds
    • formal methods
  • natural language
    • acquisition
    • translation
    • semantic analysis of linguistic phenomena
  • philosophy related to the above
